description: This source file defines functions and data structures related to managing tone events and descriptions, including getting entry counts, getting entries, setting and getting parameter values for tone events, tone descriptions, and tone patterns. It appears to be part of a telephony or voice management component, providing interface functions for manipulating tone-related configurations.

methods.name: ULONG ToneEvent_GetEntryCount(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Retrieves the count of tone event entries.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE ToneEvent_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG nIndex,ULONG * pInsNumber)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific tone event entry by index.

methods.name: BOOL ToneEvent_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG uValue)
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for a tone event.

methods.name: BOOL ToneEvent_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a tone event.

methods.name: LONG ToneEvent_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for a tone event.

methods.name: BOOL ToneEvent_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for a tone event.

methods.name: ULONG ToneDescription_GetEntryCount(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Retrieves the count of tone description entries.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE ToneDescription_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG nIndex,ULONG * pInsNumber)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific tone description entry by index.

methods.name: BOOL ToneDescription_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value from a tone description.

methods.name: BOOL ToneDescription_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets a BOOL parameter value in a tone description.

methods.name: LONG ToneDescription_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value from a tone description.

methods.name: BOOL ToneDescription_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG uValue)
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value in a tone description.

methods.name: BOOL ToneDescription_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value in a tone description.

methods.name: ULONG TonePattern_GetEntryCount(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Retrieves the count of tone pattern entries.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TonePattern_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG nIndex,ULONG * pInsNumber)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific tone pattern entry by index.

methods.name: BOOL TonePattern_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves ULONG parameter values from a tone pattern.

methods.name: BOOL TonePattern_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Retrieves BOOL parameter values from a tone pattern.

methods.name: LONG TonePattern_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameter values from a tone pattern.

methods.name: BOOL TonePattern_GetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,int * pInt)
methods.description: Retrieves int parameter values from a tone pattern.

methods.name: BOOL TonePattern_SetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,int iValue)
methods.description: Sets int parameter values in a tone pattern.

methods.name: BOOL TonePattern_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG uValue)
